bibl.title: Polis and Megalopolis: Philo and the Founding of Alexandria.
bibl.note: There are clear indications in Philo's text (De opificio mundi 17-18) that in composing his image of the founding of a city he is actually thinking of the foundation of his own city, Alexandria.
bibl.seg: Runia David T., Polis and Megalopolis: Philo and the Founding of Alexandria.
There are clear indications in Philo's text (De opificio mundi 17-18) that in composing his image of the founding of a city he is actually thinking of the foundation of his own city, Alexandria.
